name: Haya Schulmann
content: Haya SchulmannSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationHomeI am a full professor at the Goethe-Universität Frankfurt. My goal is to make the Internet more secure. I research all aspects of systems and network security, explore vulnerabilities in the Internet, and design defenses using tools from various research areas, such as machine learning, program analysis, fuzzing, and algorithms.Up-to-date information on my research can be found at the homepage of my research group at Goethe-Universität Frankfurt. Google SitesReport abuseGoogle SitesReport abuse
